subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The American midfielder Michael Bradley, the son of the United States national team coach, Bob Bradley, scored in SC Heerenveen’s 2-2 tie Sunday at F.C. Utrecht in the Dutch league.
snippet: The American midfielder Michael Bradley, the son of the United States national team coach, Bob Bradley, scored in SC Heerenveen’s 2-2 tie Sunday at F.C. Utrecht in the Dutch league.
